show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

title: Nuclear Disarmament
content: Charlene Spretnak speaks with Robert Dodge of Physicians for Social Responsibility about recent actions demanding... <!--more--> enforcement of the Nuclear Non-Proliferation Treaty of 1970, in which the Nuclear Weapons States are required to make serious progress toward total nuclear disarmament; also the NSR-Rotary grassroots campaign to eliminate nuclear weapons and war; poem by Gerard Manley Hopkins
